Technology.Name: Deuterium Power Cells
Technology.LongDescription: This technology will switch all of your ships' power cells over to the newer Deuterium standard. Deuterium cells can hold 20% more power than a standard cell, which translates into longer effective range for ships as well as greater energy pools available for combat systems.

UnlockedBonus.Name: Fuel Cell Upgrade
UnlockedBonus.Description: Gain an empire-wide 20% bonus to the amount of power that is stored in fuel cells
